meanings.definition: The act of setting up or using a pavilion.
meanings.sent1: During the picnic, the pavilioning provided shade for everyone.
meanings.sent2: The pavilioning at the park was perfect for our family gathering.
meanings.sent3: The pavilioning made the outdoor party feel like a fancy event.
meanings.sent4: Her pavilioning skills turned the open space into a cozy shelter.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pavilioning stood out in the green park.

meanings.definition: The process of constructing a pavilion.
meanings.sent1: The pavilioning of the new structure took weeks to complete.
meanings.sent2: Watching the pavilioning of the stage was fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The pavilioning of the tent seemed like a giant puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The pavilioning of the gazebo was a true work of art.
meanings.sent5: The careful pavilioning resulted in a sturdy and beautiful shelter.

meanings.definition: The practice of hosting events in a pavilion.
meanings.sent1: Our pavilioning of the wedding reception was a great success.
meanings.sent2: The pavilioning of the concert attracted many music lovers.
meanings.sent3: The pavilioning of the birthday party made it unforgettable.
meanings.sent4: Her pavilioning of the charity event raised a lot of funds.
meanings.sent5: The pavilioning of the festival created a joyful atmosphere.
